mlogic.algos.struct

Interface BST<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Item to be stored in the tree
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BalancedBinarySearchTree, BinarySearchTree

    public interface BST<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    Specifies the methods to be implemented by any Binary Search Tree implementation
    Author:
    Rajaram G

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinaryNode<T> get(T item)
      Traverses the binary tree using the item and returns the containing node if the item is found.
      java.lang.Integer height() 
      BinaryNode<T> maximum()
      Returns the right-most node in the tree
      BinaryNode<T> minimum()
      Returns the left-most node in the tree
      BinaryNode<T> predecessor(BinaryNode<T> node)
      Finds a node using the given item and returns the node just to the left of it in the tree.
      void put(T item)
      Inserts item if it does not already exist in the binary search tree.
      void remove(T item)
      Traverses the binary tree using item and removes the containing node and re-balances the tree.
      java.lang.Integer size() 
      BinaryNode<T> successor(BinaryNode<T> node)
      Finds a node using the given item and returns the node just to the right of it in the tree.
      java.lang.String toString()

      • predecessor

        BinaryNode<T> predecessor(BinaryNode<T> node)
        Finds a node using the given item and returns the node just to the left of it in the tree. Returns null if the given item is not found or it is the left most entry in the tree.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        node containing predecessor item

      • successor

        BinaryNode<T> successor(BinaryNode<T> node)
        Finds a node using the given item and returns the node just to the right of it in the tree. Returns null if the given item is not found or it is the right most entry in the tree.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        node containing successor item
